assessments.status_rationale: No coverage of the November 5 FOMC decision in today’s news; meeting has not concluded.
No BLS October CPI Core print reported; release is due by November 15.
No Census retail sales control group data cited; September report expected by October 16.
No mention of the Euro area October Composite PMI final; release due by November 6.
No report of U.S. September housing starts; data due by October 17.
No coverage of China September Total Social Financing; PBOC release is due by October 15.
No weekly jobless claims update in today’s articles; threshold could still be reached before November 15.
No evidence today of the VIX closing at or below 14.00; window remains open through November 30.
No reporting on USD/CNH reaching 7.20 or lower; deadline is November 30.
The performance window runs to November 30; articles mention tech-related moves but do not establish final relative performance vs. financials.
No confirmation of WTI settling at or below $74; monitoring continues through November 30.
No report of Dutch TTF settling at or below €33/MWh; outcome remains open until November 30.
